events.message: The insured reported a car accident that occurred at the intersection of Main St. and 3rd Ave., describing damage to the front bumper and airbags deployed.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident due to keywords such as vehicle, collision, and car found in the initial report.
Agent Johnson was assigned to handle the claim and contacted the insured to gather further details about the accident and the extent of damage.
The insured received confirmation that the claim has been officially acknowledged and is now under review by the claims department.
The insured was asked to provide photos of the vehicle damage, a police report, and medical reports related to injuries sustained in the collision.
All requested documents, including images of the damaged car and the official police accident report, were submitted successfully by the insured.
The claims investigation team began reviewing the submitted evidence and contacted the repair shop to verify damage estimates for the vehicle.
The investigation concluded that the collision was mostly the other driver’s fault and damage estimates have been confirmed for repairs.
A settlement offer was proposed to the insured, covering the repair costs and medical expenses related to injuries from the accident.
The insured expressed satisfaction with the prompt offer and appreciated the responsiveness of the claims team throughout the process.
Following review, the claim was approved for full coverage of damages as per the insurance policy terms.
Payment for the approved claim was processed and transferred to the insured’s bank account to cover repair and medical costs.
The claim file was formally closed after confirmation that the insured received payment and was satisfied with the resolution of the accident claim.
All records and documentation related to this auto accident claim were archived for future reference and compliance purposes.
